examples.example: 我梦想有一个属于自己的小窝，哪怕只有一平方米，也会让我感到无比幸福。

translate.english: I dream of having a small nest of my own, even if it is only one square meter, it will make me feel extremely happy.

examples.example: 我在阳台上开辟出了一平方米的小天地，在这里晒太阳看书，惬意极了。

translate.english: I have carved out a one-square-meter small world on the balcony, and I enjoy basking in the sun and reading here, which is extremely pleasant.

examples.example: 我的书房里有个一平方米的角落，那是我最喜欢的阅读区。

translate.english: There is a one-square-meter corner in my study, and that is my favorite reading area.
